```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(here)
library(glue)
library(readxl)

library(EMLassemblyline)
```

```{r}
data_dir <- here('nes-lter-chla-post-calibration')

post_cal_fluo <- merge_csv_directory(glue('{data_dir}/post-cal-fluo'))
uw_discrete_cont_match <- merge_csv_directory(glue('{data_dir}/uw_discrete_cont_match'))

output_dir <- here('output')

write.csv(post_cal_fluo, glue('{output_dir}/post-cal-fluo.csv'))
write.csv(uw_discrete_cont_match, glue('{output_dir}/uw_discrete_cont_match.csv'))
```
